description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix-based web application. It handles HTTP requests, detects if the request is from a bot or a browser, and manages server-side rendering of React components via streaming responses. It also sets CORS headers and handles OPTIONS preflight requests.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, handles OPTIONS requests, and delegates to specific functions based on whether the request is from a bot or a browser.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming the response directly.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming the response similarly to handleBotRequest.
